## Description {#details}

Creates prototypes for functions that are lazily linked on the fly.

This speeds up linking for modules with many/ lazily linked functions of which few get used.

Definition at line 357 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/linker/irmover-cpp">IRMover.cpp</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### materialize() {#ab0129641b394b278d2571681c0bfd6ed}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Value &#42; GlobalValueMaterializer::materialize (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; V)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This method can be implemented to generate a mapped Value on demand.

For example, if linking lazily. Returns null if the value is not materialized.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/linker/irmover-cpp/#l00362">362</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/linker/irmover-cpp">IRMover.cpp</a>.
